General.Name: Xinjiang Sayram Modern Agriculture Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang Sayram Modern Agriculture Co., Ltd engages in the research and development of agricultural high-tech products in China. The company is also involved in processing and sale of cotton products; spinning of cotton yarns; mining and processing of ores; transportation and storage services for coal and agricultural products; and trading of goods. In addition, it offers lint, cottonseed, and related by-products; plain and fine yarns; calcium oxide, quartz stone, and related by-products; coal railway transportation services; grains; and warehousing services for agricultural products, such as edible oil. The company was established in 1999 and is based in Shuanghe, China.
